query:
-- Dla wszystkich pracowników: monthlyCostTotal powinien zawierać vacationCostMonthly
UPDATE employees 
SET monthlyCostTotal = monthlyCostTotal + vacationCostMonthly
WHERE vacationCostMonthly > 0;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 4JUsBG2X2GLXRvW.root --database NohioRQJxaLfTKHfAohCFR --execute

UPDATE employees
